text:
We (over at CliMA) are _stoked_ to be upgrading to Julia 1.6 soon.

```julia> @time using ClimateMachine # Julia 1.5.4
[ Info: Precompiling ClimateMachine [777c4786-024f-11e9-21a3-85d5d4106250]
209.253125 seconds (76.28 M allocations: 4.394 GiB, 0.69% gc time)```
```julia> @time using ClimateMachine # Julia 1.6
 11.711064 seconds (25.37 M allocations: 1.863 GiB, 5.02% gc time, 0.03% compilation time)```
Thank you, everyone responsible, for making this release awesome! :rocket:

elements.text: We (over at CliMA) are
stoked
to be upgrading to Julia 1.6 soon.

209.253125 seconds (76.28 M allocations: 4.394 GiB, 0.69% gc time)

julia> @time using ClimateMachine # Julia 1.6
 11.711064 seconds (25.37 M allocations: 1.863 GiB, 5.02% gc time, 0.03% compilation time)
Thank you, everyone responsible, for making this release awesome!

text: Isn’t that comparing apples to oranges though? It seems like your timing includes precompilation for 1.5 but not for 1.6 (where it happens on `] add ClimateMachine`). In any case, 1.6 rocks! :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: Isn’t that comparing apples to oranges though? It seems like your timing includes precompilation for 1.5 but not for 1.6 (where it happens on
] add ClimateMachine
). In any case, 1.6 rocks!

text: probably some lines were skipped with the fancy spinner animations

elements.text: probably some lines were skipped with the fancy spinner animations

text: There is no parallel precompilation (and no spinner) when `using` a package that isn’t precompiled. That part is still serial.

elements.text: There is no parallel precompilation (and no spinner) when
using
a package that isn’t precompiled. That part is still serial.

text: Yeah, sorry if this is misleading, <@U018Z5UTBPH>  pointed out that one may be loading vs precompiling

elements.text: Yeah, sorry if this is misleading,
pointed out that one may be loading vs precompiling

text: Regardless, I can confirm that upon starting up after `julia --project` and running this command, the timing is "relatively" accurate. Not sure what magic is happening behind the scenes!
